response.english: Are you going to the party?
response.portuguese: Você está indo para a festa?
response.randomEnglish: They are playing football in the park.
response.randomPortuguese: Eles estão jogando futebol no parque.

response.english: He does his homework every day.
response.portuguese: Ele faz a lição de casa todos os dias.
response.randomEnglish: I am not watching TV right now.
response.randomPortuguese: Eu não estou assistindo TV agora.

response.randomEnglish: We are not going to the movie theater tonight.
response.randomPortuguese: Nós não vamos ao cinema hoje à noite.

response.english: You play the guitar very well.
response.randomPortuguese: O cachorro late todas as manhãs.
